text: Omoseye Bolaji (born August 16 1968, died 22 May 2022) is a Nigerian-born writer. He went on to become a successful author of many books in South Africa. He is a novelist, poet, playwright, and journalist. He was conferred with the Chancellor's Medal by the University of the Free State in 2007. His published works include Impossible Love (2000), People of the Townships (2003), My Life and Literature (2007), Miscellaneous Writings (2011) and It Couldnâ€™t Matter Less (2013) In 2022, Omoseye Bolaji published two new books in early February: * BOOKS BARDS AND BARBS (2022) * IYA ALAJE (2022) ==References== ==Other websites== *The Bard Of Bloemfontein Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:South African writers Category:Writers from Ibadan
title: Omoseye Bolaji
